title: I hate Top Lane Rammus
body:
That 40 CD nerf on his ult was really shitty for jungle Rammus players.

Can you guys please stop getting my champs nerfed by playing them in non-standard lanes? Thanks.

replies.body: It's more.... so I build 89458093485093 armor, do a fuck ton of damage, YES! That's what is broken.
He doesn't even do that much damage. He just abuses sunfire and thornmail really well.
In normals I've never seen a rammus top lane, I barely see him jungle.
It's apparently a roughly 50/50 split, according to champion.gg.
